alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 08 at 7:59PM CST until February 08 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Eastern Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Western Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 900 PM CST. * At 759 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cranfield, or 13 miles east of Natchez, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Stampley around 805 PM CST. Hamburg, Mcnair and Kirby around 810 PM CST. Fayette around 815 PM CST. Union Church and Blue Hill around 825 PM CST. Mcbride, Pleasant Hill and Peyton around 830 PM CST. Allen around 835 PM CST. Barlow around 840 PM CST. Glancy around 845 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Roxie and Meadville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central, south central and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
